text: The 64{+t}{+h}anniversary celebrations of Sri Sathguru Sangeetha Samajam will be inaugurated on Monday (January 4) by Susie B. Varghese, Principal Commissioner of Income Tax. The 10-day music and arts festival will begin with a vocal concert by Ramakrishnan Murthy at Lakshmi Sundaram Hall. On January 10, the Samajam president, Shobana Ramachandran, would present the ‘madurakala praveena’ title on vocalist Sanjay Subramanyan, ‘madurakala mani’ on mrudanga vidwan Palladam R. Ravi and cash award to violin vidwan M. Dhakshinamoorthy.
title: Samajam anniversary from January 4
